Package org.waarp.ftp.core.command

Global classes that store all informations on implemented commands, arguments, reply codes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCommand
    Abstract definition of an FTP Command
    FtpArgumentCode
    Definition of all Argument of Parameter commands (MODE, STRU, TYPE)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FtpArgumentCode.TransferMode
    Mode of transmission org.waarp.ftp.core.data TransferMode
    FtpArgumentCode.TransferStructure
    Structure of transmission org.waarp.ftp.core.data TransferStructure
    FtpArgumentCode.TransferSubType
    SubType of transmission org.waarp.ftp.core.data TransferSubType
    FtpArgumentCode.TransferType
    Type of transmission org.waarp.ftp.core.data TransferType
    FtpCommandCode
    This class must reassemble all the commands that could be implemented.

Package org.waarp.ftp.core.command Description

Global classes that store all informations on implemented commands, arguments, reply codes.
